name: 2024届闵行区高三一模英语听力部分
questions: The woman's tour to Zhejiang province.
The woman's impression of the museum.
She is too tired to enjoy the film.
She has seen the film before.
She is eager to see the new film.
She has no interest in the film.
She was as confident as she looked.
She sang with all her heart.
She could hardly finish the song.
It's average, nothing to write home about.
It's something terrible he never fancied.
He regretted not having prepared sufficiently.
He isn't aware of the topics of the speaking test.
He has prepared everything for the oral exam.
He discussed the prepared topics in the oral exam.
Low-income Mexican students who want to be pilots.
Low-income Californian students who live in Mexico.
Low-income Mexican students who live near the US border.
Low-income Californian students who want to attend community colleges.
Helping Californians become lawmakers in the US.
Increasing diversity among workforce in the US.
Making it easy for Mexicans to achieve education.
Avoiding loss of talent in the United States.
To attract international companies to the UK.
To check if a shorter workweek is achievable.
A way to attract and keep talent.
A try-out of a new workweek policy.
Inform someone of your return time.
Tell someone how you can be identified.
Use the most advanced board and sail.
